--- title: Basil Montgomery human: Lindsay Malloy, Associate Professor, Ontario Tech University description: | Basil (pronounced "baz-uhl" the British way) Montgomery is very much loved and adored by his mom, dad, and older brother and sister (ages 5 and 7). We can barely remember our lives pre-Basil even though we have only had him about 2 months! Award winning puppy (February 2023 "Pawsitive Puppies Oshawa, ON" Best Trick Contest). quote: “Even softer and fluffier and cuter in real life! The original sad puppy dog eyes.” image: featured.jpg categories: Cavalier King Charles Spaniel age: "4 months" talent: Ringing a service bell when we say "Service" and sometimes confusing it with a "Spin" or "Sit" command (he's learning!) habit: Inhaling his entire meal in less than 30 seconds (not a single chewing sound to be heard) and barking at his own reflection in the fireplace title-block-categories: false title-block-banner: false title-block-style: none priority: 2 --- ::: grid ::: {#about-pet-text .g-col-12 .g-col-md-6} ![](featured.jpg) ::: ::: {.g-col-12 .g-col-md-6} ::: {simple-info} ### Quote: > {{< meta quote >}} ### Breed: {{< meta categories >}} ### Bad Habit: {{< meta habit >}} ### Special Talent: {{< meta talent >}} ::: ::: ::: ##### Submitted by: {{< meta human >}} ## Bio {{< meta description >}} ## Gallery ::: {.cell} ::: {.cell-output-display} ```{=html}
